sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces close in on recaptured settlements in Kherson following the withdrawal of Russian troops, while power outages continue in the capital, Kyiv.

sentences.sentence: Twitter's new CEO, Elon Musk, says the company may go bankrupt in a call with employees after the entrepreneur fired half of his workforce just a week ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At long last, the migrant rescue ship, the Ocean Viking Viking has docked in Toulon, France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The vessel was stranded at sea for over two weeks after Italy refused to grant the 230 rescued passengers on board a safe port to disembark.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Operator SOS Mediterranean says three survivors had to be airlifted on Thursday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In the next few hours, France will take measures to strengthen controls at our internal borders with Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It will also draw all the consequences of the Italian attitude on the other aspects of its bilateral relationship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: If the migrants are granted asylum, France will take in one-third of the beneficiaries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The duty of our countries is to welcome people who are in a situation of distress, such as this one, and to ensure that once they're here, they're taken care of so that no one dies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While Italy has expressed what it said was its heartfelt appreciation for France's decision, SOS Mediterranean says this is a dramatic failure and that European states have violated maritime law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Prosecutors in the Belgian capital Brussels say the man suspected of fatally stabbing a police officer and injuring another was on a list of potential extremists. Local media reports say the lone suspect, who was shot and taken to hospital shouted Allahu Akbar, the Arabic phrase for God is great, during the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The stabbing took place around 7.15pm near the Gardienor station in Brussels city centre when a man with a knife attacked a police patrol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They called in reinforcements and another officer used his gun to shoot the assailant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The ACV police union said in a Facebook post that a person had gone to police earlier in the day threatening an attack, but no action was taken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Belgium has been hit by several terror attacks in recent years, including suicide bombings in 2016 that killed 32 people and injured hundreds more in the Brussels metro and airport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's a potential turning point for Ukraine's counter-offensive in Kherson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Defending troops have recaptured 41 settlements in the province, but presidential adviser, Mikhailo Podolyak, warns that withdrawing Russian soldiers have laid mines throughout the region and is calling on Ukrainian troops to remain vigilant. The first and most basic thing after de-occupation is de-mining.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The occupants left behind thousands of mines and unexploded ammunition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I've heard estimates that clearing Ukraine of Russian mines will take decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, the U.S. announced a new 392 million euro military aid package for Ukraine, which includes important air defense contributions such as missiles for Hawk air defense systems but as temperatures drop urge repair work is underway on the country's power plants in recent weeks Russian shelling has damaged about 40 percent of Ukraine's energy infrastructure leaving millions of civilians across the country facing widespread blackouts with what to the capital Kiev plunged into darkness without streetlights, pedestrians here now use headlights from passing vehicles and traffic signals to guide them home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Battle of Kherson is not over, but Russian forces have entered a new phase,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: prioritizing withdrawing their forces across the river in good order and delaying Ukrainian forces rather than seeking to hold the Ukrainian counteroffensive entirely, says the Institute for the Study of War.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian counteroffensive in the Kherson direction since August, a coordinated interdiction campaign to force Russian forces to withdraw across Dnipro without necessitating major Ukrainian ground offensives has likely succeeded as the Institute for the study of war has observed over the past few months Ukrainian forces engaged in a purposeful and well executed campaign to target Russian concentration areas military assets logistics nodes throughout Harrison region and bridges across the Dnipro River.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The UK Defence Ministry says with limited crossing points, Russian forces will be vulnerable in crossing Dnipro. It is likely that the withdrawal will take place over several days with defensive positions and artillery fires covering withdrawing forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Institute for the study of war says the Russian withdrawal from the West Bank of Dnipro is unlikely to be a trap meant to lure Ukrainian troops into costly combat near Harrison City as some Ukrainian and Western sources have suggested the think tank has previously observed many indicators that Russian forces have steadily withdrawn from West Bank across Dnipro river. Russian commanders will certainly attempt to slow Ukrainian advances to maintain an orderly withdrawal and some forces may remain to delay Ukrainian troops in Kherson city itself but this fighting will be a means to the end of withdrawing as many Russian units as possible in good order under Ukrainian pressure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Commander of the Russian Armed Forces in Ukraine, Army General Sergei Sorovikin, notably stated that half of the troops withdrawn from the West Bank of Dnipro will be redeployed to other areas of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the loss of Kherson West Bank will likely prevent Russia from achieving its strategic aspiration of land bridge reaching Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Fast food chain KFC is in hot water for accidentally marking the anniversary of a 1938 Nazi pogrom against Jews with a cheesy chicken promotion, where the 90 people were killed in the Kristallnacht attacks, which were widely considered to be the catalyst to the Holocaust. KFC has apologised and says the alert was an automated notification.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's now suspended up communications to ensure the mistake doesn't happen again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The European Medicines Agency has approved a COVID-19 booster shot produced by Sanofi Pasteur, a French pharmaceutical giant located near the city of Lyon. The vaccine contains spike protein found within the beta variant and components that strengthen the body's defense system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, the company has promised first access to the US market, which has prompted an angry reaction from the French government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: access to the US market, which has prompted an angry reaction from the French government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Civil servants in the UK say they will go on strike if the government doesn't meet their demand for a 10% pay rise to match inflation. It's just the latest sector to announce industrial action over the cost of living crisis. Train drivers have already held several days of strikes and will soon be joined by nurses and university workers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: US entrepreneur Elon Musk, who has been Twitter's majority shareholder and CEO since the end of October, warns that the company could go bankrupt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: end of October warns that the company could go bankrupt. In a letter to Twitter's employees, the 51-year-old warned a significant increase in revenue was urgently needed to keep the social media giant afloat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Without an increase in revenue made from subscriptions, he said there was a good chance Twitter will not survive the upcoming economic downturn.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: To date, the company has been heavily dependent on its advertising contracts. However, Musk now wants to focus on paid services. For a monthly fee, Twitter plans to let users verify the authenticity of their accounts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This comes as the new CEO tightened working conditions and told employees on Thursday that remote working was no longer allowed and that all staff will need to clock in at least 40 hours at its San Francisco headquarters per week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Following a 50% cut to its workforce and the resignation of three privacy and compliance officers, the US Federal Trade Commission says it is watching the company with deep concern. The US stock market soared this Thursday in its best day in more than two and a half years. Investors were emboldened by a report showing inflation in the U.S. had eased last month by even more than expected. Consumer price increases went from 8.2 percent in September to 7.7 percent in October, a sign that inflation may be showing hopes of cooling off, even if it remains

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: at a near four-decade high. But analysts cautioned it's still premature to declare that with certainty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Slower inflation could keep the Fed from raising interest rates in order to slow the economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The biggest risk is that this could create a recession. Another potentially market-shaking report will hit Wall Street today when the latest reading will show how much inflation U.S. households should expect in future years.
